snippet: Facebook's value will be determined by whether it can leverage the personal data of 800 million users to attract advertisers, and how deftly the company can handle privacy concerns, Somini Sengupta and Evelyn M. Rusli report in The New York Times.
abstract: Facebook's value will be determined by whether it can leverage the personal data of 800 million users to attract advertisers, and how deftly the company can handle privacy concerns, Somini Sengupta and Evelyn M. Rusli report in The New York Times.
lead_paragraph: Facebook's value will be determined by whether it can leverage the personal data of 800 million users to attract advertisers, and how deftly the company can handle privacy concerns, Somini Sengupta and Evelyn M. Rusli report in The New York Times. Read more »

headline.main: Personal Data's Value? Facebook Is Set to Find Out
